title: rajata vainItaka ArUDha rAjagOpAla
sahitya:
rajata vainItaka ArUDha rAjagOpAla nagadhara mangaLa 
shubha varadAyaka navamaNI bhUSaNa yadukula nAyaka


anupallavi

  sujana jIvanAdhAra kishOra sugandhAnuliptAnga rAdhA manOhara 
sundara suravara vanditapada giri mandharadhara bhava bandha bhayaharaNa


caraNam    sEvita yAdava mAgadha caraNa siddha gandhrava pOSa bhAvita gOpa vadhUjana jIvana 
parama kalyANa guNa lOla dEvakI nandana parama dayAkara divya kaishOra vESa dEvadEva 
mahAnubhAva divya vanamAla bhUSa sundara suravanditapada giri mandara bhavabhaya haraNa
